name: Email Deliverability
description: Technical checks to ensure email deliverability and authentication

seo.title: Email Deliverability Checklist v1.0.0 | lksy.org
seo.description: 24 technical checks for email deliverability including SPF, DKIM, DMARC, and DNS configuration.

checks.name: SPF Record Configured
checks.description: Verify SPF (Sender Policy Framework) record exists and is valid
checks.rationale: SPF prevents email spoofing and improves deliverability

checks.name: DKIM Signature
checks.description: Verify DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) is configured and signing emails
checks.rationale: DKIM provides email authentication and improves deliverability

checks.name: DMARC Policy
checks.description: Verify DMARC (Domain-based Message Authentication) policy is configured
checks.rationale: DMARC protects against email spoofing and phishing

checks.name: Reverse DNS (PTR) Record
checks.description: Verify reverse DNS record exists for sending IP

checks.name: Bounce Handling
checks.description: Verify bounce handling is configured (return-path, bounce address)

checks.name: List-Unsubscribe Header
checks.description: Verify List-Unsubscribe header is present in emails
checks.rationale: Required by Gmail and improves deliverability

checks.name: From Address Consistency
checks.description: Verify From address domain matches sending domain

checks.name: Reply-To Address
checks.description: Verify Reply-To address is set and valid

checks.name: IP Reputation Check
checks.description: Verify sending IP is not on blacklists

checks.name: Domain Reputation Check
checks.description: Verify sending domain is not on blacklists

checks.name: SPF -all Mechanism
checks.description: Verify SPF record ends with -all or ~all (not +all)
checks.rationale: Strict SPF policy prevents unauthorized sending

checks.name: DMARC Policy Enforcement
checks.description: Verify DMARC policy is set to quarantine or reject (not none)

checks.name: DKIM Key Length
checks.description: Verify DKIM key is at least 1024 bits

checks.name: MX Records Configured
checks.description: Verify MX records exist for domain

checks.name: TXT Records Valid
checks.description: Verify all TXT records (SPF, DMARC) are valid and not too long
checks.rationale: Invalid or overly long records cause issues

checks.name: Sending Rate Limits
checks.description: Verify sending rate is within provider limits

checks.name: IP Warmup Process
checks.description: Verify new IPs follow warmup process

checks.name: Engagement Tracking
checks.description: Verify opens and clicks are being tracked

checks.name: Unsubscribe Link
checks.description: Verify unsubscribe link is present and functional
checks.rationale: Required by law (CAN-SPAM, GDPR) and improves deliverability

checks.name: Physical Address
checks.description: Verify physical mailing address is included (CAN-SPAM requirement)

checks.name: Subject Line Length
checks.description: Verify subject line is under 50 characters (mobile-friendly)

checks.name: Preheader Text
checks.description: Verify preheader text is present and meaningful

checks.name: Image Alt Text
checks.description: Verify all images have alt text
checks.rationale: Alt text improves accessibility and deliverability

checks.name: HTML Validation
checks.description: Verify HTML is valid and well-formed
checks.rationale: Invalid HTML can cause rendering issues
